name: inserter-visualizer
title: Inserter Visualizer
description:
Indicates which lane of a belt inserters place onto. 

- Use the smart-hotkey __CONTROL__toggle-global-inserter-visualizer__ to highlight drop locations of all inserters, just the selected inserter, or inserters placing onto the selected transport belt line. 
- Use __CONTROL__toggle-selection-highlighting-shortcut__ to toggle live selection highlighting.
author: asher_sky
